answers.author: Peter Dunn
answers.text:
Hi Wayne,
I am ICMA's Knowledge Network manager. For help using the website and creating your profile, you can email customerservices@icma.org, or if you're a member of the Alliance for Innovation, email Tracy Miller at tmiller@transformgov.org.

author: Steve Davus
text: Does anyone know who the web master is for the Knowledge Network?  I don't see it posted any where.   I am having problems retaining changes in my personal profile.
title: KNOWLEDGE NETWORK WEB MASTER
